name: onOffline
author: Plugin Builders

sections.description:
Notify your visitors when their internet connection goes down. Disable links so they don’t end up with error pages.Notify your visitors when their internet connection goes down. Disable links so they don’t end up with error pages.

onOffline

Contributors: plugin.builders
Tags: offline,online, internet, usability, links
Donate link: http://plugin.builders
Requires at least: 3.0
Stable tag: 0.2
Tested up to: 4.0
License: GPLv2 or later

Notify your visitors when their internet connection goes down. Disable links so they don’t end up with error pages.
sections.installation:
Upload onOffline folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
Go to Settings > onOffline to set preferences.
Save, and it’s done.Upload onOffline folder to your wp-content/plugins/ directory.
Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
Go to Settings > onOffline to set preferences.
Save, and it’s done.
